thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: ELIZABETH FLETCHER
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by ELIZABETH FLETCHER

author: ELIZABETH FLETCHER
title: ELIZABETH FLETCHER
text:
I was very happy with my purchase from KIWI Drug. The medicated cream I bought from KIWI came in the 2 weeks that they said it would come. My local drugstore wanted over $100 for the same size tube that KIWI sold for $13.99 plus around $7 shipping, so for little over $20 I got the same product that my drugstore wanted over $100 for as my insurance didn't cover this exact product which I needed. I had an RX from my doctor but it wasn't even necessary. This is a cream that I normally need to get about twice a year. I will definitely get this from Kiwi again when it's time for a new tube. And I am telling all my friends about this wonderful mail order drug company.
Thank you Kiwi.
